entry.title: Derby Originals Deluxe 9 Item Horse Grooming Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Grooming Kits
Price: 24.99

Get all of your grooming items to match in this Grooming Kit by Derby Originals. Comfort grip ribs on the hoof pick and comb are easy on your hands, while the round-backed brushes fit easily in the palm of your hand. This set is great for if you're just starting out, got another horse, or just need a kit or two to throw in the trailer or to have out at the barn. The lid zips closed, so you don't have to worry about your tools falling out and getting lost. This set makes a great gift too!
  • Adjustable Shoulder Strap
  • Closes with a zipper
  • Approximately 7" long, 9" tall, 7" wide
  • Includes eight grooming tools

Included Components:
  • Bathing Sponge
  • Contoured Sweat Scraper with Rubber Edge
  • Soft Brush with 1" Nylon Bristles
  • Hard Brush with 1.5" Nylon Bristles
  • Oval Massage Curry
  • Tail Comb
  • Mane Comb
  • Hoof Pick with Brush

entry.title: Derby Originals Premium Ringside Large Horse Grooming Supply Tote Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Grooming Totes
Price: 14.95

Derby Originals Premium Ringside Large Horse Grooming Supply Tote Bags are new for 2020! Due to customer demand, we’ve finally released these colorful grooming totes which match our famous Derby Originals horse grooming kits. These new grooming totes feature a large central pocket that is perfect for storage and 6 extra outside pockets around the tote for extra storage. Our grooming totes measure 12” long, 8” wide, and 9” tall, and include a removable padded shoulder strap that can extend from 29” to 36” long. Our grooming kits are available in the colors Mint/Green, Grey/Black, Magenta/Black, and Purple/Lavender and are perfect for equestrians young and old, pet owners, or that special person in your life who’s looking for the perfect tote! Additional grooming tools sold separately.


MULTIPURPOSE GROOMING TOTE - our fun colorful tote bags aren’t just for horse grooming but are great for storing pet grooming supplies, gear for trail rides or shows, cleaning supplies, and more!

MATCHES OUR BEST-SELLING GROOMING KITS - due to customer demand, we’ve finally released these colorful grooming totes which match our famous Derby Originals horse grooming kits.

MAKES A GREAT GIFT - our grooming tote bags are available in four fun color combinations and are perfect for equestrians young and old, pet owners, or that special person in your life who’s looking for the perfect tote!

GREAT FOR ORGANIZATION - our grooming totes feature a large central pocket that is perfect for storage and 6 extra outside pockets around the tote for extra storage. Our grooming totes measure 12” long, 8” wide, and 9” tall.

AVAILABLE IN FOUR COLORS - our grooming kits are available in the colors Mint/Green, Grey/Black, Magenta/Black, and Purple/Lavender.



Measurements:

Length: 12”

Width: 8”

Height: 9”

Number of Pockets: 6

Strap: 29” - 36”

entry.title: Derby Originals No-Bow Leg Wrap and Standing Bandage Pair
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Polo Wraps & Bandanges
Price: 24.95

PROVIDES SUPPORT AND WARMTH - our standing wraps are perfect for providing your horse with extra leg cushion and support after a workout, before a contest, or while trailering. These cozy bandages also help to warm the leg muscles.

PROMOTES BETTER CIRCULATION - our bandages help to improve circulation in the legs by applying an even, gentle pressure. Making sure your horse has proper leg circulation is critical for riding, sport, or performance horses and especially so after an injury.

GREAT FOR WOUND CARE - our bandages are gentle on the skin and were designed to help keep wounds clean and improve healing. They can be used in combination with any topical medicine.

CAN BE USED DRY OR WET - our bandages can be used on their own to help support the leg, reduce inflammation, and promote better circulation, or can be used as a wet bandage along with astringents, liniments, and topical treatments.

IDEAL FOR RIDING AND PERFORMANCE HORSES - thee bandages are a staple for any horse and are great to use after a ride, to protect the legs while traveling, for use in a stall to prevent stacking up or stiffness, or for performance horses.

**This is one pair of two wraps**

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Lightweight Aluminum Horse Mane Pulling Comb and Hoof Pick Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Grooming Tools
Price: 1.95

Tahoe Tack's aluminum comb and hoof pick combo tool are designed to be one tool for grooming or pulling manes, as well as cleaning hooves. This handy tool helps to save space in your grooming bag. Made from aluminum, this comb is strong, durable, and incredibly lightweight. This tool is perfect for keeping in your grooming bag as it's easy to transport and carry. These pulling combs measure 6.75" long and have sturdy aluminum teeth and a solid aluminum hoof pick at the other end. This size is ideal for both pulling manes and picking hooves.

HANDY SPACE-SAVING MULTITOOL - this aluminum comb and hoof pick combo was designed to be one tool for grooming or pulling manes, as well as cleaning hooves. This handy tool helps to save space in your grooming bag.

DESIGNED FOR MANE PULLING - these combs are specially designed for mane pulling, which is the act of pulling mane hairs out by the root to shorten and evenly thin the mane for better presentation and to make braiding easier.

LIGHTWEIGHT SOLID ALUMINUM DESIGN - this combination mane pulling and hoof picking tool is made from aluminum, which is strong, durable, and incredibly lightweight. This tool is perfect for keeping in your grooming bag as it's easy to transport and carry.

CONVENIENT SIZING - these pulling combs measure 6.75" long and have sturdy aluminum teeth and a solid aluminum hoof pick at the other end. This size is ideal for both pulling manes and picking hooves.

INCLUDES A BUILT-IN HOOF PICK - this pulling comb has a built-in hoof pick at one end to allow you to easily remove rocks, dirt, and other debris from your horse's hooves. Proper hoof care is critical for your horse's health and wellbeing.

entry.title: Derby Originals Horse Cleaning and Bathing Sponges
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Grooming Tools
Price: 1.00

Use this sponge to bath your horse, clean your tack or any other chore in place of a rag. Conforms to fit your hand and the horse. Use it with any shampoo, conditioner, and cleaner that you like.

These sponges may have discolored/dyed spots that are yellow or green. This is normal discoloration and will not affect their performance.

These sponges measure approx. 6 1/4" x 3 1/4" x 1 5/8".

  • The perfect size for bathing and grooming
  • Also works great for cleaning tack

If we do not have your desired sponge color available, we will sub in other available colors of sponge.

entry.title: Derby Originals Drop-Forged 10 oz Farrier Driving Hammer with Stainless Steel Head
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Hoof Care
Price: 7.95

Derby Originals 10oz drop-forged farrier driving hammer was designed with farriers in mind. This hammer features a flat beveled face on one end of the head for driving nails, while the claw face is perfect for grasping, hooking, and twisting horseshoe nails. Our farrier hammer is balanced to prevent vibration and features a sturdy hardwood handle that has been sanded and stained so it is comfortable to hold. The head of this driving hammer is made of stainless steel, which is a strong, highly durable, hygienic, and corrosion-resistant material, all of which makes it ideal for farrier use.

STAINLESS STEEL HEAD - this driving farrier hammer has a stainless steel head for increased lifespan and durability. Stainless steel is strong, highly durable, hygienic, and corrosion resistant, all of which makes it ideal for farrier use.

BEVELED FACE REDUCES CHANCE OF CHIPPING - this farrier hammer features a beveled edge on the face of the hammer to decrease the risk of chipping or damage occurring during use.

BALANCED DESIGN - this drop-forged farrier hammer has been balanced to prevent vibration and improve usage. This makes using our hammer easier and more comfortable for you.

SMOOTH EASY TO GRIP HARDWOOD HANDLE - this farrier hammer features an 11.5" long smooth wooden handle that has been sanded and stained. This handle is comfortable to hold and is made from strong hardwood for increased durability.

DESIGNED FOR FARRIER WORK - this hammer was designed with farriers in mind and features a flat beveled face on one end of the head for driving nails, while the claw face is perfect for grasping, hooking, and twisting horseshoe nails.
